name: Loose Goose
description:
Control the military to defend a town from huge genetically engineered mutant geese. 

[GOAL]

Kill the geese before they kill to many civilians. The city is a lost cause when there is only 500 people left. If that happens then there will be launched a nuke that destroys the entire city.

[CONTROLS]

  • MB1 - Launch missiles
  • W,A,S,D - Move camera
  • Q,E - Rotate camera

[GAME JAM]

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, and the game jams theme was "Out Of Control".
